channel.title: Server Restarter
channel.description: i need the best server restarter there is

item.title: Server Restarter
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“zez1ma boy, post:7, topic:163823”][quote author=Iamadam link=topic=222537.msg1923508#msg1923508 date=1197273547]
It’s funny, Jagex’s servers manage to run for days and sometimes even weeks without being restarted. Why is it that private servers struggle to last a fraction of that time?
[/quote]

its because servers are not coded by 13 year olds plus runescape has like 700 handlers that hadnles the lag they even have hndlers for chat! lal!!! they even got handlers for combat etc…

plus they ace pcs not some crap pentium 0.4 things[/quote]

/Fail

It’s because their knowledge of java is higher than all of mscp put together. Also, it has nothing to do with their so called “Handlers”, the majority of the time they’re paying for a dedicated host.

^all I got.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Restarter
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

It is perfectly possible to create a server that will handle about 100 players on a decent machine, and not need to be restarted every 30 minutes
I was pointing to the fact that private server architecture sucks.

Read full topic
